ai-tha-ap224:2.2_0: the world is attached to the world,
ai-tha-ap224:2.3_0: Though this sacrifice has been given up,
ai-tha-ap224:2.4_0: the world doesn’t stay close to the world.
ai-tha-ap224:3.2_0: I conquered the victor of corruptions.
ai-tha-ap224:3.4_0: to the teaching of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap224:4.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap224:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap224:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap224:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Assaji.
ai-tha-ap224:8.1_0: The senior monk who was not a companion messenger.
